title: ASUS TUF Gaming 27" 1080P Monitor - Full HD, 165Hz (Supports 144Hz), 1ms, Extreme Low Motion Blur, FreeSync Premium, Shadow Boost, Eye Care, HDMI, DisplayPort, Tilt Adjustable - VG277Q1A,Black
description: Introducing the ASUS TUF Gaming 27” 1080P Gaming Monitor (VG277Q1A). This ASUS monitor is perfect for gamers who demand smooth and responsive gaming performance with no lag. It features a Full HD display with 165Hz (supports 144Hz) refresh rate, 1ms Extreme Low Motion Blur and FreeSync Premium for seamless visuals and smooth gameplay. The monitor also includes a Shadow Boost feature for improved visibility in dark scenes and an Eye Care feature for reducing eye fatigue. It also comes with both HDMI and DisplayPort connectivity, as well as a Tilt Adjustable stand for easy viewing. With its cutting-edge features, the ASUS TUF Gaming Monitor (VG277Q1A) is the perfect choice for gamers who want to take their gaming experience to the next level.
